name: statcheckloltrivia
description: An app that uses the Riot Games static API to get information on League of Legends in-game stats (e.g. minion health scaling, Illaoi's attack damage per level, health and armor of mid tower) and does stuff with it. Not sure if I want this to be a trivia game, a damage simulator, or what...honestly, at the moment this is just setting up a base for later.
author: Reina Adeline Helms <reinahelms@gmail.com>
